sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './GameOver.css' import database from '../firebase' function GameOver(props) { let bestTime = 0 let count = 0 database.ref('/users/'+props.difficulty).push(props.time) database.ref('/users/'+props.difficulty).orderByValue().limitToFirst().once("value",(snapshot) => { snapshot.forEach((child) => {bestTime=child.val()})}) let newRecord = false if(bestTime == props.time) newRecord = true; else return(

Nice Work!

Time: {props.time}

{newRecord ?

New Record!!

:

Best Time: {bestTime}

}
) } export default GameOver
